reviews.review:
Un FPS cooperativo o en solitario sin demasiados alardes técnicos pero que te harán pasar unas cuantas horas de diversión reventando las cabezas de los zombies y demás especímenes del entorno. Al principio es un poco complicado el manejo del teclado y el ratón a la vez (sobretodo si nunca has jugado a juegos de este estilo), pero poco a poco le vas cogiendo el rollete y mola bastante. 
Recomiendo jugar al modo cooperativo ya que tus compañeros te pueden salvar el culo más de una vez.

Élvezetes lenne, ha nem 5 másodpercenként jönne a zombi horda....kurva unalmas...egyedül ezt játszani.
Másik pedig az hogy iszonyúan bugos, elkezdem hegeszteni a szekrényt, vagy a széfet és beakadok, de annyira hogy még fegyvert sem tudok váltani...

Nekem nem jött be...

Meg a fegyverek többsége csak DLC-vel lehet megvenni, ami enyhén szólva pénzlehúzás.

Pro:
- sok fajta zombi
- jó ai
- unreal engine

Cons:
bugok (beakadsz a szekrénybe, nem tudsz fegyvert váltani)
kevés fegyver
DLC szagú.

Recomendo para aqueles que não tem condições de baixar jogos pesados no computador , ou que tenha um computador não muito bom, veja a minha nota pessoal a cada item no jogo
NOTAS:
graficos: regulares , podiam ser ainda melhores ( 7 )
Jogabilidade Online : Poucas pessoas jogam porém é bem divertido ( 7 )
Jogabilidade Offline : Muito chata , sem modo Historia , somente sobrevivencia pelo que eu vi ( 5 )
TOTAL:6,0

Obs Final: Apesar de ser um  jogo meio sem sentido e uma boa perca de tempo para aquelas horas chatas , principalmente no modo online! , para aqueles que necessitão de um jogo gratis , este não é a solução , vão ter que compra-lo para deicha-lo permanente! ( - 0,5 )

fun multiplayer game, enjoy the guns, dlc's and the graphics 9/10

1-6 players (sometimes more) co-op survival (more players = more Zeds) 
where you must survive waves of Zeds (basically zombies) of various difficulty
before facing off against the Boss (Patriarch). 

There are many different classes to choose from, like Commando, Firebug, 
Sharpshooter, Medic, etc, and a massive amount of weapons you can use 
which you must buy with dosh (money)which you earn for surviving and killing 
Zeds. The game has a few different levels of difficulty. It's pretty basic at first 
glance so long as you're playing on Beginner/Normal difficulty but as you 
become more skilled, rank up and move into Hard, Suicidal and Hell on Earth 
difficulty, which class/weapon you use and how you play becomes far more 
important - even Normal difficulty will be a challenge for most people at first. 

Teamwork is vital to achieve victory - going lone wolf, being selfish and 
anti-social will definitely lead to failure, especially in the harder difficulties. 

If this is what you want, you can play Solo.

I highly suggest starting with Beginner/Normal difficulty lest you become a 
massive burden on your team, earn a bad rep and/or get kicked. There are so 
many maps to play on too and lots of achievements to earn. The game is highly 
addictive in my opinion. It's pretty hardcore (I like that personally). I won't write 
an essay on the game or every aspect of it but I definitely recommend it. Also, 
you will find that in lower difficulties people are more toxic and not as teamwork 
orientated but just chill out, have fun and slowly move into the higher difficulties 
where people are usually more focused and know how to play - which by then
you should too! If not, play on the lower difficulties a while longer. But as long 
as you're contributing, listening to whoever takes the lead and don't act like a 
total imbecile then you'll be fine.

A good game to pass time. A lot of games these days are getting really lame or get old quick. Maybe it's just me growing out of gaming.... So sad.... Anyway, as you can see, I pass a lot of time on this game because it's simple and entertaining for a round or 2. 

Gameplay: It's a FPS, what more can I say? I like the weight system. Holding a bigger gun makes you run slower etc.

Graphics: Good. Doesn't need to be amazing and it's not really bad either.
